nodes.text: Xydge was a Trandoshan who worked as a security guard for the band Distraction, along with his brothers Rydge and Stydge. When the band traveled to the ship Sleemo Poya Jeedai to perform at a concert, Xydge and his brothers accompanied them and met with some spacers who were providing additional security during the event. He and his brothers co-operated with them in investigating the threat posed to the event by Niklas Cories and Xydge escorted some doubles, who were posing as members of the band, off the ship in an attempt to confuse him.
